title: FS: several postcards, including Coveleski, Hornsby, Mantle, Rose, Jackson, etc.
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: FS: several postcards, including Coveleski, Hornsby, Mantle, Rose, Jackson, etc.
posts.post_content:
I just updated my "for sale" page on my imageevent website.  There are lots of goodies there, including many pre- and post-war postcards, including "rookie" and "pre-rookie" postcards.  Below is a sampling of what you might find.

email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if you're interested in anything listed.

[url]https://imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum[/url]
